author: hwright
msg: Merge r28578 from trunk, fixing a dangling pointer induced crash.

author: epg
msg: Refine operational logging for svn log.
(dav_svn__log_report): Make the log action parseable by replacing
'revprops=(REVPROPS...)'.  The old form wasn't quite parseable, as
the (revprops list) may have been missing and the next item on the
log line (perhaps the user agent) may have started with '('.

author: epg
msg: figure out what "partial" meant in log action, but agreed this
should just log the list of paths as other operations (e.g. log)
do.  Also log the inherit value.
